summary: Fixes various errors in the ESP file for Skyrim Peasant Fashion.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Description -[/b]

Fixes some missing meshes and other things in the ESP file for Skyrim Peasant Fashion.
[b]
- Requirements -[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17720/?]Skyrim Peasant Fashion
[/url]
[b]- Installation -[/b]

Unzip the .esp and simply drop it in your Skyrim\Data directory, it should overwrite the ESP from Skyrim Peasant Fashion as they have the same name.

[b]- Uninstallation -[/b]

Delete the following files from your Skyrim\Data directory.
1) PIVariety.esp
2) PIVariety.bsa

You will get naked NPCs in your current save game doing this, but they are easy to fix following the steps below. If you have created a bashed patch you will have to re-make the patch or manually clean it.

[b]- Fixing Already Naked NPCs -[/b]

If you have had [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17720/?]Skyrim Peasant Fashion[/url] installed already you may have naked NPCs already in your save game and those will not be fixed by this patch, to fix them follow these simple steps.

1) When facing the NPC bring up your console.
2) Select the NPC by clicking on them.
3) Type disable and press enter.
4) Type enable and press enter.
5) Exit the console.

[b]- Compatibility -[/b]

Any mod which makes changes to the leveled lists for Farmer or Barkeeper clothing will require a bashed patch or the clothes will not show up. Example: Clothing And Clutter Fixes, Stealth Skills Rebalanced.

[b]- Changelog -[/b]

1.1 - Fixed a missing clothing item in one of the leveled lists which could lead to naked people.
1.0 - Initial release.

[b]- Credits -[/b]

Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4238403]Paulimposteur[/url] for his great mod and allowing me to post this ESP fix!

[b]- Permissions -
[/b]
Any changes done to this file requires permission from me and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4238403]Paulimposteur[/url] before being uploaded anywhere.
author: DigitalVixen
